entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
